an10.45:3.1: This is what came up in the conversation among the king’s retinue today, while sitting together in the royal compound.”
an10.45:4.1: “Mendicants, there are ten drawbacks to entering a royal harem.
an10.45:4.3: Firstly, a king is sitting with his chief queen
an10.45:4.5: When the queen sees the monk she smiles, or when the monk sees the queen he smiles.
an10.45:4.7: ‘They’ve done it for sure, or they will do it.’
an10.45:4.8: This is the first drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:5.1: Furthermore, a king has many duties, and much to do. He has sex with one of the women but doesn’t remember.
an10.45:5.4: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:5.5: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:5.6: This is the second drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:6.1: Furthermore, a gem is lost somewhere in the royal harem.
an10.45:6.3: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:6.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:6.5: This is the third drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:7.1: Furthermore, secret deliberations in the royal harem are leaked outside.
an10.45:7.3: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:7.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:7.5: This is the fourth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:8.1: Furthermore, in a royal harem, a father longs for their son, or a son longs for his father.
an10.45:8.3: ‘No-one else has entered here, except for that monk.
an10.45:8.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:8.5: This is the fifth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:9.1: Furthermore, the king promotes someone to a higher position.
an10.45:9.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:9.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:9.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:9.5: This is the sixth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:10.1: Furthermore, the king demotes someone to a lower position.
an10.45:10.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:10.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:10.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:10.5: This is the seventh drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:11.1: Furthermore, the king dispatches the army at the wrong time.
an10.45:11.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:11.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:11.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:11.5: This is the eighth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:12.1: Furthermore, the king dispatches the army at the right time, but orders it to turn back while still on the road.
an10.45:12.2: Those who are upset by this think:
an10.45:12.3: ‘The king is close to that monk.
an10.45:12.4: Could this be the monk’s doing?’
an10.45:12.5: This is the ninth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:13.1: Furthermore, in the royal harem there is a trampling of elephants, horses, and chariots, as well as arousing sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches that are not appropriate for a monk.
an10.45:13.2: This is the tenth drawback of entering a royal harem.
an10.45:13.3: These are the ten drawbacks of entering a royal harem.”
